title: Bug 17289: Combo box does not receive focus when clicked on (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first combo box, it does not receive focus.
OB: When the first combo box is clicked on, it does not receive focus.
EB: When the first combo box is clicked on, it should receive focus.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. 2. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus goes to the second combo box, 'Repository Path:'.
